name: 2D Shooter (JGifford)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Project.

Modifications:

  1. The rate of fire for the player
  2. The rate of fire for the enemy
  3. The amount of lives depending on the level
  4. How many levels there are
  5. Enemies for each level
  6. Winning screen that sends you back to the Main Menu

Credits:

Created by: Joseph Gifford

End Screen: Inspired by: John Adrian
